import { useState, useContext } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import Modal from '../components/Modal'; function BuildingSearch() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [isAuthenticated, setIsAuthenticated] = useState(false); const [showAuthModal, setShowAuthModal] = useState(false); const [filters, setFilters] = useState({ distance: '', rent: '', rooms: '', bathrooms: '', squareFootage: '', }); // Mock data with updated traits const buildings = [ { id: 1, name: "The University Commons", distance: 0.2, // miles from university rent: 2400, rooms: 3, bathrooms: 2, squareFootage: 1200, description: "Modern apartment complex with premium amenities and spacious layouts.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1522708323590-d24dbb6b0267" }, { id: 2, name: "Campus View Apartments", distance: 0.5, rent: 1800, rooms: 2, bathrooms: 1, squareFootage: 900, description: "Luxury student living with stunning campus views and modern facilities.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1545324418-cc1a3fa10c00" }, ]; const handleAddListing = () => { if (!isAuthenticated) { setShowAuthModal(true); return; } navigate('/add-listing'); }; const handleAuthRedirect = () => { setShowAuthModal(false); navigate('/signup'); }; return (
{/* Back Button and Header */}
Back to Home

Find Your Perfect Place

Discover student-friendly apartments and housing options near your campus

{/* Filters Section */}
{/* Add Listing Button */}
{/* Results Grid */}
{buildings.map((building) => (

{building.name}

{building.distance} miles from NEU

{building.rooms} bed â€¢ {building.bathrooms} bath

))}
setShowAuthModal(false)} onSignUp={handleAuthRedirect} />
); } export default BuildingSearch;
